info.description: This is documentation for FlexxWare API from Soluvine GmbH.  You can find out more about Soluvine solutions at [https://soluvine.com/flexxlink](https://soluvine.com/flexxlink).  </br> The FlexxWare API is using REST API to define its endpoints. This page also provides sample Authorization information and sample responses to each API endpoint.
info.title: FlexxWare for Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations

post.summary: Retrieve status and log information of a FlexxLink message.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Retrieves status and log information of a FlexxLink message.

integrationJobId.description: Use integrationJobId or messageId to get the status and log information. If both are provided, integrationJobId is used to get the information.

messageId.description: Use integrationJobId or messageId to get the status and log information. If both are provided, integrationJobId is used to get the information.

prodStatus.description: Status of a production order that should be set. See enum for possible values.

prodId.description: The value from the header will be used (1) on the line in case no value is given on the line, (2) for Production journals header Production Id value.

wrkCtrId.description: The value from the header will be used on the line in case no value is given on the line.

jobFinished.description: If true, sets job to finished.

oprFinished.description: If true, sets operation to completed.

wrkCtrId.description: Resource id in D365 F&O. If not provided, it is retrieved using jobId.

prodId.description: The value from the header will be used (1) on the line in case no value is given on the line, (2) for Production journals header Production Id value.

wrkCtrId.description: The value from the header will be used on the line in case no value is given on the line.

hours.description: Hours or one of qty fields is mandatory.

oprFinished.description: If true, sets operation to completed.

oprNum.description: Defines where the operation occurs in the sequence of operations for the production.

oprPriority.description:
Operation priority
0 - Primary operation
1 - Secondary operation 1
2 - Secondary operation 2
3 - Secondary operation 3
4 - Secondary operation 4
5 - Secondary operation 5
6 - Secondary operation 6

qtyGood.description: Hours or one of qty fields is mandatory.

qtyError.description: Hours or one of qty fields is mandatory.

prodId.description: The value from the header will be used (1) on the line in case no value is given on the line, (2) for Production journals header Production Id value.

wrkCtrId.description: The value from the header will be used on the line in case no value is given on the line.
Resource id in D365 F&O. If Site, Warehouse and Location are empty, then input location from wrkCtrId is used.

oprNum.description: Defines where the operation occurs in the sequence of operations for the production.

fileData.description: Base64 encoded document. Accepts PDF, MSG, TIFF, JPG.

processingTime.description: Precision of two digits. Unit defined in D365. If provided, must match delta of timestampStarted and timestampFinished.

resource.description: If jobId is not specified, then resource ID is used to locate first assigned operation/job
